name: Fracture SOLIS
description:
Fracture SOLIS

A game of precision and pacing. Smash gems to rack up a high score, but beware of explosives thrown into the mix. Attack from every angle in a spiraling quest for points with increasing difficulty as time passes. What's your high score?

Features
  • Vibrant colorful visuals
  • Three kinds of gems to smash
  • Dynamite explosions
